about.title: Who We Are: From Industry Experts to AI Educators
about.missionText: Empowering educators to embrace the new era of AI teaching
about.background1: "We don't just teach AI; we create AI."
about.background2: Our foundation comes from a leading IT solutions company that has successfully delivered AI products for important clients such as schools and educational institutions in Hong Kong.
about.background3: Now, our experienced AI practice team is dedicated to sharing this practical knowledge through education, bringing cutting-edge AI technology to educators.
about.whatWeDo: What We Do and Why It Matters to You
about.servicesText: We provide practical hands-on AI and technology courses for professionals, educators, and students to help them master the skills needed for the future. We have a successful training record, such as successfully organizing workshops for local schools and the Education Bureau, helping their teams effectively apply AI technology.
about.empower: How We Empower Secondary School Teachers:
about.empowerText: We help you deeply understand how AI will transform the education industry and provide practical tools and strategies to keep you ahead in a rapidly changing teaching environment.
